title: Bullet Bill

fields.name: - Playing this card puts you in a speeding bullet. You choose to discard cards according to the placement you are currently in based off card count:
fields.value:
```
1st: Discard 1 card
2nd: Match with 1st
3rd: Discard until 1 more than 1st
4th: Discard until 2 more than 2nd
5th: Discard 4 cards
6th - 12th: Match with Placement - 3
13th+: Match with 6th
```
 - You are additionally immune to Blue Shell (223) for 1 round.

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: The upper text explains the mechanic.

desc:
Post 2396
- __Tag: Mario Kart__: This card cannot be played and has its passives disabled unless if this is the most recent-drawn Mario Kart item card.
